query:
-- Create twDataSyncStatus table
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `twDataSyncStatus` (
  `id` int AUTO_INCREMENT NOT NULL,
  `dataType` varchar(50) NOT NULL,
  `source` varchar(50) NOT NULL,
  `lastSyncAt` timestamp NOT NULL,
  `status` enum('success','partial','failed') NOT NULL,
  `recordCount` int NOT NULL DEFAULT 0,
  `errorMessage` text,
  `createdAt` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  `updatedAt` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  CONSTRAINT `twDataSyncStatus_id` PRIMARY KEY(`id`)
);

CREATE INDEX IF NOT EXISTS `dataType_idx` ON `twDataSyncStatus` (`dataType`);
CREATE INDEX IF NOT EXISTS `lastSyncAt_idx` ON `twDataSyncStatus` (`lastSyncAt`);

-- Create twDataSyncErrors table
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `twDataSyncErrors` (
  `id` int AUTO_INCREMENT NOT NULL,
  `dataType` varchar(50) NOT NULL,
  `symbol` varchar(10),
  `errorType` varchar(50) NOT NULL,
  `errorMessage` text NOT NULL,
  `errorStack` text,
  `retryCount` int NOT NULL DEFAULT 0,
  `resolved` boolean NOT NULL DEFAULT false,
  `syncedAt` timestamp NOT NULL,
  `createdAt` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  CONSTRAINT `twDataSyncErrors_id` PRIMARY KEY(`id`)
);

CREATE INDEX IF NOT EXISTS `dataType_idx_err` ON `twDataSyncErrors` (`dataType`);
CREATE INDEX IF NOT EXISTS `symbol_idx_err` ON `twDataSyncErrors` (`symbol`);
CREATE INDEX IF NOT EXISTS `syncedAt_idx` ON `twDataSyncErrors` (`syncedAt`);
